00016 void Timer::init()
00017 {
00018   gettimeofday(&t_start,NULL);
00019   t_pause_cumul.tv_sec = 0;
00020   t_pause_cumul.tv_usec = 0;
00021   paused_time=0;
00022 }
00023 
00024 void Timer::pause()
00025 {
00026   gettimeofday(&t_pause_start,NULL);
00027   paused_time=getTimeS();
00028   paused = true;
00029 }
00030 
00031 void Timer::resume()
00032 {
00033   gettimeofday(&t_pause_end,NULL);
00034   t_pause_cumul.tv_sec += t_pause_end.tv_sec - t_pause_start.tv_sec;
00035   t_pause_cumul.tv_usec += t_pause_end.tv_usec - t_pause_start.tv_usec;
00036   paused = false;
00037 }
00038 
00039 double Timer::getTimeS()
00040 {
00041   if(!paused)
00042     {
00043       gettimeofday(&t_end,NULL);
00044       return ((t_end.tv_sec-t_start.tv_sec-t_pause_cumul.tv_sec) + (t_end.tv_usec-t_start.tv_usec-t_pause_cumul.tv_usec)*1e-6);
00045     }
00046   else
00047     return paused_time;
00048 }
00049 
00050 double Timer::getTimeMs()
00051 {
00052   if(!paused)
00053     {
00054       gettimeofday(&t_end,NULL);
00055       return ((t_end.tv_sec-t_start.tv_sec-t_pause_cumul.tv_sec)*1000. + (t_end.tv_usec-t_start.tv_usec-t_pause_cumul.tv_usec)*1e-3);
00056     }
00057   else
00058     return paused_time*1000.;
00059 }
